Articles.Content:
The launch vehicle is a monster, and the landing is a bit unwieldy, but with a bit of luck, this spacecraft will let you land three DEMVs on the Mun in one launch.

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/h8sfC/embed"></iframe>
Thats cool! Nice work! No do for Space Stations!

Show off.

People are having enough trouble getting one of those guys to land on a planet and you do three.

Tommygun, he landed on the Mun. If he could take this to a planet though, that would truly be impressive. And laggy. Also, if this was a three person shuttle, it wouldn't require us to have a base already built up on our target
Wow man, thats an awesome rocket you have there, 3 demvs, WUT?

Thanks, everyone.

I'm fairly certain I could get this to another planet with some modifications to the launch vehicle and cruise stage. I may make a version with a three-man command module, should be as easy as swapping the part in the craft file and moving a few things around in VAB. Currently, however, I am working on a two-story, 5-Kerbal habitat cube, which will be followed up with a 3-Kerbal launch to establish a base. The reason for the small capsules on the garage (and hab cube) is simply not putting all my eggs in one basket.

Nifty "craft", and a great album showing it off.

(So you actually managed to drive under an arch with no ill effects?)

EDIT: Also diggin' the Venturer multirover bus linked in your sig.

Edited October 5, 2012 by Commander Zoom

I'm still struggling getting a DEMV I to the Munar surface T_T and I see this... Show off.

I'm only joking that thing is beyond a monster!

Nifty "craft", and a great album showing it off.

(So you actually managed to drive under an arch with no ill effects?)

EDIT: Also diggin' the Venturer multirover bus linked in your sig.

Thanks. Yeah, I walked, jetpacked, and drove the DEMV through the arch with no ill effects. Everything I did was in the lower part of the opening, though. I'm not sure if that has an effect. Thanks, glad you like the Venturer.

Please help me!

What is DRhinge2 and DRarmtruss1?

I can't find this parts
You'll need to download Damned Robotics.
